text:
Hugh Michael Horace Dancy (born 19 June 1975) is an English actor. He is known for his role as titular character in the television movie "David Copperfield" (2000).
Other movie roles include Joe Conner in "Shooting Dogs" (2005), Grigg Harris in "The Jane Austen Book Club" (2007), Luke Brandon in "Confessions of a Shopaholic" (2009), Adam Raki in "Adam" (2009) and Ted in "Martha Marcy May Marlene" (2011).
